main.name: Neil Ferman
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react, react-native, JavaScript, and Typescript to develop pages. I also use Jave Spring/Hibernate, C# .NET and ASP.NET to build backend servers, along with SQL to design databases
main.bio: With over 2 years experience working in AGILE environments to set up mobile apps and webpages on large teams, I come equipped with knowledge of how to get a project done in a timely manner. I am also a game making hobbying using Unity 2D and 3D, where I have set up Augmented Reality applications using sockets to communicate between a server and mobile app, as well as designed 2D games using the Corgi engine and More Mountains Topdown engine.
main.contactmessage: I am open for new experiences as a contracter, full time position, or freelance work. Contact me if you feel I can help you build a web app or video game engine.

education.description: President of the Video Game Making Club. Treasurer of the Board Game Design Club. Third place winner for Senior Project with AR-Top, a mobile app (Android and iOS) which used sockets to grab live updates of a map and render it in AR.
